sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>tree</radical> has an <radical>umbrella</radical>, and it's holding it over his head, which is strange, because trees normally like water... turns out, it's not water falling on him, but dollar <kanji>bills</kanji> floating down.
meaningInfo: The sick part of this is that those dollar <kanji>bills</kanji> were once this tree's friends. The tree is sobbing uncontrollably as pieces of his friends fall on him and all around him - which is why he's using the umbrella to protect himself.
readingMnemonic: The tree couldn’t take the body parts of his friends falling down on him, so he <reading>sat</reading> (<ja>さつ</ja>) down, and began crying uncontrollably.
readingInfo: What else could he do? He couldn’t move, so he sat. It’s weird imagining a tree trying to sit…
